document.full_text: prime minister yves leterme berated the king's 47-year-old son, prince laurent, in parliament, saying the prince should take government advice on trips or lose his generous royal stipend.
document.title: europe: belgium: prince's allowance at risk
lines_and_colors: prime minister yves leterme berated the king's 47-year-old son, prince laurent, in parliament, saying the prince should take government advice on trips or lose his generous royal stipend.
